ISSUE.TITLE: Add "APISIX Helm Charts" to "Good first issue" section
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve Docs ## Please describe which part of docs should be improved or typo fixed Anyone could help to add `APISIX Helm Charts Good first issue[1]` to README? ## Describe the solution you'd like 1. Visit https://github.com/apache/apisix/edit/master/README.md 2. Find the Good first issue part ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2106987/106995546-1a6f1e80-67ba-11eb-9032-96300992485b.png) 3. Copy `[Apache APISIX Helm Charts](https://github.com/apache/apisix-helm-chart/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22)` on Line50; 4. Don't forget to update README in Chinese; 5. Submit your excellent PR! [1] https://github.com/apache/apisix-helm-chart/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22

COMMIT.MESSAGE: docs: add four more projects to the "Good first issue" section fixes #3527
docs: add four more projects to the "Good first issue" section fixes #3527
